name: Catsteroid
description:
This Asteroids game reinvention is a creative project and a real challenge for the game dev students of Interface 3. After a month of learning Python and using various graphic design tools,  we have to design an inovative version of the famous arcade game. It's my first game in Python. 

My purpose was to give it trendy tones - for example Ultra Violet, designated color of the year 2018 by Pantone. This purple shade was a perfect choice to remind cosmos and space to the player. To add a touch of fun, I decided that the my rocket driver would be a cat. It hunts asteroid mice that threaten intergalactic peace. My Asteroids game has become Catsteroid !

You can control the ship with arrows.
